column7: Covers a variety of topics designed to help students learn more about, and be better prepared to enter, the advertising industry as professionals. Course content will include an overview of careers in the advertising industry while paying particular attention to areas of future career growth. This course is centered on field study where students will participate in interactive discussions with industry professionals at media related agencies and other industry businesses. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 6 hours, if topics vary. Credit hour(s) are determined by the instructor and approved by the department head.
